channel.title: Dashboards on Online survey data analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Dashboards on Online survey data analysis

item.title: New feature
item.description:
• With a click, generate a script that defines your dashboard

  • Duplicate & customize with copy and paste

  • Create reusable templates

item.title: No coding
item.description:
Your client will:

  • Filter, slice, dice and find insights

  • Export key tables and visualization as editable PowerPoint objects, ready for presentation, all by themselves.

item.title: The new normal
item.description:
• Drag and drop, no code needed

  • Design & create tables, graphs

  • Add filters with a few clicks

  • Customize, resize, reorder, brand

  • Export as editable PowerPoint slides
